doc.title: 20q
doc.plot: The Twenty Questions Association of America is growing slowly, but to an odd group of devoted fans, the world is focused on little else. Set in the hills of Tennessee, this mocumentry follows Lolita Dorchuck, a stressed out mother of three and aspiring Twenty Questioner, Fritzgerald McDermott Doubet, the leader of the local Twenty Questions chapter, Martin Miller the 2002 National Twenty Questions Champion, and the other members as they strive to win and advance onto the national Twenty Questions competition.

The Twenty Questions Association of America is growing slowly, but to an odd group of devoted fans, the world is focused on little else. Set in the hills of Tennessee, this mocumentry follows Lolita Dorchuck, a stressed out mother of three and aspiring Twenty Questioner, Fritzgerald McDermott Doubet, the leader of the local Twenty Questions chapter, Martin Miller the 2002 National Twenty Questions Champion, and the other members as they strive to win and advance onto the national Twenty Questions competition.
